About Us

AreYouGame.com was founded in late 1998 by University Games led by Vince Kurr and Bob Moog. In 1999, AreYouGame.com was incorporated as a new company and it began its mission to offer a definitive selection of games, activities, and puzzles to people throughout the country. In 2019, the business moved to Kansas City, MO where it continues to provide an incredible selection and outstanding service.


What Makes An Are You Game Product?

AreYouGame provides you and your family with the best new and original games, puzzles, and activities with the goal of creating meaningful memories with the whole family. Our team in Kansas City, MO spends hours designing, developing, and testing new games, puzzles, and activities to ensure they meet and exceed the AreYouGame standard.
